main.name: Beau Hale
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
main.bio: Experienced Front End web developer with Full Stack developer experience and education. I am a bootcamp graduate with an extensive background in various coding languages, developing mobile apps, and building websites from the ground up. Detail-oriented and design mindset. 20+ years of experience in the salon industry which gives me expert level design and aesthetics to my work. I also have an interest in UI/UX, which ensures that my websites and apps are both beautiful and user-friendly.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

education.description: 6 month full-time Full Stack Immersion program.  Mastering HTML, CSS, Javascript, React & React Router, Git & Github, TDD Testing, Asynchronous programming, fetch APIs, Frontend deployment, Node & Express, Postgres, Backend deployment.

education.degree: Certificate in Front End and Mobile development
education.description: 6 month remote Frontend + Mobile development program. Foundational beginnings in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React & React Native, MongoDb, Node, Express.

work.title: Lead Instructor
work.description: Led a cohort of 20+ students through a 6 month full stack web development program.  Created and gave lectures, lessons and study in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, and Ruby on Rails.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Aligned with the dev team on the company website and migration to Mobile Apps.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Collaborated with senior devs to develop projects for websites throughout phases of the project's life cycle.

testimonials.text: Beau is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Beau has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
